long_description: Built with fast-rolling 29 in. wheels, the Cannondale Trail 29er 4 men's hardtail mountain bike combines a cushy shock-absorbent fork and reliable Shimano components to take on flowing singletrack. SR Suntour XCR suspension fork delivers 100mm of travel with lockout adjustment. Shimano components deliver snappy shifts through the 27 gears. Light 6061 aluminum frame has double-butted tubes along with shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. Cannondale Helix 6 hydraulic disc brakes offer superb speed management for tiny finesses or big, outright stops. Sturdy Maddux rims are wrapped with WTB Nine Line tires, which offer a small block tread for speedy cross-country performance. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required. Specs on the Cannondale Trail 29er 4 men's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
